title: Application of Project Management Methodologies for Online Project-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Team-based mathematical problem-solving projects in BYOD environments, with enhanced collaboration via project management tools.

learning_goals: Learners can establish team-based mathematical problem-solving schedules using project management tools (Kanban boards, Gantt charts)
Learners can efficiently perform communication and role distribution among team members using online collaboration tools (Google Workspace, Trello).
Learners can systematically develop and submit deliverables for a mathematical modeling project by applying a project management framework.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
